The item is obtained by defeating the **King of Flowing Sand** and **Second Rat Prince** in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair (mandatory boss) in Yellow Wind Ridge. It can be used beneath the arena on the cliff edge to summon the **First Prince of Flowing Sands** (optional boss) in Yellow Wind Ridge.
